name: Upar Edu Toy
description: Upar udu toy this project is full stack toy market place based website
bulet_point: User Account Features: The website offers login, sign-up, and toy addition functionality
Toy Listing and Details: The website categorizes toys, provides featured toy listings within categories, and reviews.
Shop page allow any toy add to cart if user login or contact page allow user contact

name: Instro Learn Camp
description: Upar udu toy this project is full stack toy market place based website
bulet_point: User Features: user can select course pay option with stripe and user can see pay history
Instructors Features: instructors can add course and manage course like update or delete etc
Admin Features: Admin can manage all classes or all users or update user role etc

name: PototoChef
description: PototoChef this project is full stack chef based website
bulet_point: Website highlights American chefs with details like picture, name, experience, recipe count, and view
User authentication enables access to chef details, all recipes, and features like favorite button
recipe cards with toast message, while registration requires filling five fields.
